description:
Experienced and passionate, our team at Consumer Law Group, LLC, protects the rights of people in and around Chicago, Illinois. We handle immigration, family law, workers' compensation, personal injury, criminal law and employment law cases. Our law firm is a place where attorneys do hands-on research and exhaustive investigations to ensure we are delivering the best possible service to our clients.

With nearly two decades of practice, the team at our law firm is noted for its steadfast advocacy for consumers. Our proven litigation and defense tactics have resulted in favorable outcomes for countless clients. In addition to our successful track record, we also take pride in:

• Offering services in Spanish
• Working with people from all walks of life
• Providing cost-effective solutions
• Creating a friendly and professional environment

Our law firm is a place where people find peace of mind. We strive to accommodate the people we serve in every way possible. Consumer Law Group, LLC, accepts credit cards. We have four locations serving Illinois and Wisconsin. Perhaps most importantly, we understand the law, and we understand people. Our attorneys know how difficult some of these situations are, and we compassionately guide our clients through them and to a brighter future.
